description: Timed to coincide with the expected release of a Draft RFP, this RFPI creates an early opportunity for industry to provide feedback and answer questions that would clarify the solicitation documents provided in the Draft RFP, leading ultimately to prepare a mutually acceptable Request for Proposal (based on terms and conditions that have been reviewed and agreed upon by both parties).
full_summary:
Title
=====================

* **RFI Online Technical Standards and Codes**
	+ **French Translation:** Normes et codes techniques en ligne

Reference Number
----------------

* **Reference #**: WS4337860639-Doc4339692294
* **Amendment #**: 4

Solicitation Information
------------------------

* **Solicitation #**: WS4337860639
* **Publication Date**: December 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 29, 2024, 2:00 p.m. (EST)
* **Amendment Date**: January 17, 2024

Estimated Contract Dates
-------------------------

* **Estimated Contract Start Date**: March 1, 2024
* **Estimated Contract End Date**: N/A

Tender Status
----------------

* **English**: Expired
* **French**: Expiré

Technical Details
----------------

* **Industry NAICS Classification**: 81111902 (Online Database Information Retrieval Services)
* **Industry Description**: Online Database Information Retrieval Services

Procurement Overview
--------------------

* **Category of Goods or Services**: GD (Goods and Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Type**: Request for Information (RFI)
* **Notification Type:** RFI/DDR

Key Details
------------

* **Requirement Description**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking information from industry on online technical standards and codes. The objectives of this RFI include:
	+ Soliciting industry feedback on the proposed Draft RFP
	+ Allowing industry to engage in ongoing dialogue and negotiations with PSPC regarding the requirement
	+ Assisting PSPC in finalizing an RFP
* **Notices Attached**:
	+ None

Marketing Analysis
-----------------

The draft RFI contains an attachment from PSPC that outlines the proposed Draft RFP. This document is open to feedback and recommendations from industry.

Key Contact Information
-------------------------

* **Contact Name**: James, Lionel
* **Email**: [lionel.james@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lionel.james@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: N/A
* **Fax**: N/A
* **Government Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18195336?extsite=MTgxOTUzMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1
